description.value:
Characters with this do not lose the benefit of an aim action if they make a reaction before firing.

Requirements

Xenotech. +20 to Acquisition Tests for this item if acquired through Friendly Tau Settlement.

Effect: Extremely Rare

Notes: -
description.summary: Characters with this do not lose the benefit of an aim action if they make a reaction before firing.

system.effect: Characters with this do not lose the benefit of an aim action if they make a reaction before firing.
